languages.text: "Некоторые миссии требуют не только физической силы, но и твердого ума. Я хотел узнать, подойдет ли ваша кандидатура для более сложной службы".
"Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."
languages.original_text: "Некоторые миссии требуют не только физической силы, но и твердого ума. Я хотел узнать, подойдет ли ваша кандидатура для более сложной службы".

traits.locale_text: "Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."
"Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."
"Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."
"Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."
"Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."

languages.text: 「任務の中には、肉体的な力だけでなく、確かな知性も求められるものがあるんだ。あなたが、そういったより高度な任務にも適任かどうか…少し気になっていたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."

traits.locale_text: 「任務の中には、肉体的な力だけでなく、確かな知性も求められるものがあるんだ。あなたが、そういったより高度な任務にも適任かどうか…少し気になっていたんだ」

languages.text: "Einige Missionen erfordern nicht nur körperliche Kraft, sondern auch einen soliden Intellekt. Ich hatte mich gefragt, ob Ihr den schwierigeren Aufgaben wohl gewachsen seid."
languages.original_text: "Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."

traits.locale_text: "Einige Missionen erfordern nicht nur körperliche Kraft, sondern auch einen soliden Intellekt. Ich hatte mich gefragt, ob Ihr den schwierigeren Aufgaben wohl gewachsen seid."

languages.text: « Certaines missions requièrent non seulement une grande force physique, mais aussi un excellent intellect. Je voulais m'assurer que vous seriez à la hauteur de tâches plus exigeantes. »
languages.original_text: "Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."

traits.locale_text: « Certaines missions requièrent non seulement une grande force physique, mais aussi un excellent intellect. Je voulais m'assurer que vous seriez à la hauteur de tâches plus exigeantes. »

languages.text: «Algunas misiones requieren no solo fuerza física, sino también un intelecto agudo. Me preguntaba si estaría a la altura de tareas más exigentes».
languages.original_text: "Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."

traits.locale_text: «Algunas misiones requieren no solo fuerza física, sino también un intelecto agudo. Me preguntaba si estaría a la altura de tareas más exigentes».

languages.text: “有的任务不仅需要出色的战斗技巧，还需要过人的思维能力，我想了解你是否能胜任更加苛刻的任务。”
languages.original_text: "Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."

traits.locale_text: “有的任务不仅需要出色的战斗技巧，还需要过人的思维能力，我想了解你是否能胜任更加苛刻的任务。”

languages.text: "Bazı görevler için fiziksel kuvvetin yanı sıra sağlam kafa gerekir. Böyle zorlu görevlere uygun olup olmadığını merak ettim."
languages.original_text: "Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı görevler için fiziksel kuvvetin yanı sıra sağlam kafa gerekir. Böyle zorlu görevler için uygun musun, merak ettim."

languages.original_text: "Some missions require not only physical strength, but also a solid intellect. I was wondering if you would be suited to more demanding tasks."
